attributes.action: Increase the amount for contactless payments during the Coronavirus pandemic
attributes.additional_details: Allow contactless payments up to a higher value so that everyday purchases do not require you to touch a keypad and therefore reduce the spread of the virus.
attributes.background: Virus' are passed from person to person through touch and keypads have high throughput of people touching the same thing.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The contactless payment limit is set by banks.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
